page.title: 13GT HORKESLEY POLICE
page.content: { THE VILLAGE POLICEMAN { The Horkesley Police have certain duties to perform. {Protection of life and property.} {Maintainance of law and order. {Detection and prevention of crime. They start at different times each day, often at 5.00 am. Sometimes they work through the night. The station is manned by two men. The dogs are kept in kennels. P.C.Bailey has one police car. Inside the police car is a radio and a computer. He is contacted by radio or telephone by a special code then goes out to the call. His beat extends to Gt. and Little Horkesley and Boxted. He has worked in this area for three and a half years. His duties include Road safety, attending accidents, catching criminals and crowd control in emergency areas.
